title: SHAME ON YOU RIOT
body:
Rito games,how dare you desecrate the only thing holy in this land,this land we call league 'o legends

You dare to make this mistake,I PURGE YOU FROM THIS LAND!

POROCLES[or Targo],PLEASE EXPLAIN THIS >>>>>  http://i.imgur.com/0HkZGRW.jpg


I bet you were expecting something serious {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}  (ummmm...I mean,THIS IS SERIOUS!)

replies.body: Omg, don't scare my poro heart!  {{summoner:11}}   Aside from some grammar issues, I'm hoping the ability otherwise works well.  Post this on the [bug report boards t](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report)o get reviewed.  Here I am breaking a sweat and preparing myself for the worst.   >.>

Ohhhh k,didn't know that grammar mistakes count as bug reports 


P.S. remember me from yesterday?  [i'm famous] [hint : potato net]
Ohhhh yes.  :)  But yeah the bug report section is the best fit since the QA team is able to make necessary adjustments to the game itself.  :D
